title: Alquiler de chalet adosado en Port d'Andratx
description:
Calla Llamp 
Puerto Andratx – Exceptional Luxury Villa with 5 Bedrooms, Heated Pool & Panoramic Sea Views
Situated in one of the most exclusive and sought-after locations in the southwest of Mallorca, this outstanding west-facing villa offers a rare combination of privacy, elegance and breathtaking sea views. Located in a privileged hillside position in Puerto Andratx, the property is surrounded by some of the island’s most prestigious residences and caters to a discerning international clientele including yacht owners, entrepreneurs and high-profile individuals seeking peace, security and luxury.

A Prime Residence with Generous Interiors
With a living area of approximately 520 m², this villa offers exceptional space and comfort. The property includes five spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, making it ideal for families, guests or high-end hosting.

A bright and elegant living room forms the heart of the house, complemented by an adjacent dining area and a modern fully equipped kitchen boasting impressive sea views. Large windows and sliding doors create a seamless indoor-outdoor flow, opening onto a covered terrace that is perfect for dining, relaxing and enjoying the spectacular sunsets over the Mediterranean.

Outdoor Living at Its Best – Heated Pool & Sea Views
The outdoor spaces are designed to maximise sunlight, privacy and panoramic views.
A highlight of the property is the heated swimming pool, surrounded by spacious sun terraces, offering absolute relaxation and unforgettable views of the sea and coastline. This environment makes the villa an ideal haven for year-round enjoyment.

Location – Puerto Andratx, Mallorca
Puerto Andratx lies on Mallorca’s spectacular southwest coast, just under 30 km from Palma. It is widely regarded as one of the island’s most exclusive and picturesque harbours, blending a modern marina with an authentic fishing port.

The stylish harbour promenade offers a wide selection of premium restaurants, cafés and bistros. Within the town you will find several small sandy beaches, while additional beaches — such as Camp de Mar, Paguera, Cala Fornells and Sant Elm — can be reached within just 5–10 minutes by car.

For those seeking a beach club experience, Cala Llamp and La Mola offer exclusive sea-access clubs perfect for relaxing by the water.

The area is ideal for water sports enthusiasts, and golfers will appreciate the proximity to the renowned Golf de Andratx in Camp de Mar — one of Mallorca’s most beautiful courses. Additional golf courses in Santa Ponça, Poniente and Bendinat are only about 15 minutes away.

The nearest motorway exit toward Palma is approx. 1 km away, making the capital reachable in roughly 25 minutes.
